CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF( ISBLANK((I_ST_Rank__c)), "/img/samples/stars_000.gif", IF((I_ST_Rank__c)='Cold', "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF((I_ST_Rank__c)='Warm', "/resource/MilestoneTrafficLight_Green", IF((I_ST_Rank__c)='Hot', "/resource/MilestoneTrafficLight_Yellow", IF((I_ST_Rank__c)='Sizzling', "/resource/MilestoneTrafficLight_red", "/img/samples/flag_green.gif" ))))), "Rating",23,23)
CustomField.label: Rating
